desc: Frustrated with shopping options online during the pandemic, Holly Onak (who is a mom that works full time in Santa Barbara, CA) wanted to create a site full of products that are made well and made by people who are treated well. Itsallgoodshop.com offers fast and free shipping that donates 5% of all sales

layout.text: Throughout July - Spend $50 - Get Free Shipping!*
Use code "Freeship" at checkout. One use per customer on orders over $50. Valid 7/1/22 - 7/31/22
